title: Question for anyone who has seen Alien:Covenant
body: So my dad and I go to the movies every few weeks, it's our thing or whatever. He pretends that he is religious even though he doesn't live it, that's another can of worms. It usually isn't a big deal but when we saw Logan together and there was that scene in the Limo with the batcholerette party he freaked out and made a big deal out of it in the middle of the theatre. I have heard that there is a sexual scene in A:C but I can't confirm it. Can anyone verify if this is true or not and if so how graphic does it get? I really want to see it because I am a huge alien fan and he likes them too but I don't want to watch it with him if it is going to get super awkward.
